I am tired of the hustle and bustle of the world. I want to just have a peaceful mind. Play the classic song "Casta diva by Maria Callas" in the Dailymotion app

Open App: Dailymotion
Click on point (405,2271)
Click on button with the text "Search for videos, channels, topics"
Type text: Casta diva by Maria Callas
Check status: successful

Share my favorite Book "the Queen's Gambit" to my Friend Natalie larson over her gmail address -natalie.larson1998@gmail.com from the  PocketBook app.

Open App: PocketBook
Long_press on point (117,654)
Click on button with the text "More options"
Click on button with the text "Share"
Click on button with the text "See all"
Click on button with the text "Gmail"
Click on button with the text "To"
Type text: natalie.larson1998@gmail.com
Click on button with the text "Send"
Check status: successful
